price: និងដើម្បីអល់ឡោះសំអាតបណ្ដាអ្នកដែលមានជំនឿ (អំពីបាបកម្ម)និងបំផ្លាញពួកដែលប្រឆាំង។
arabic: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَمۡحَقَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: waliyumaḥḥiṣa al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayamḥaqa al-kāfirīna
